content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure appears to be a toy train or village scene with multiple elements:
- Total blocks used: approximately 18-20 blocks
- Number of layers: Primarily 2 layers, with some sections having 3 layers

## Spatial Relationships
The structure has several distinct sections:
1. Left section: Red arch blocks forming a bridge/tunnel with a green rectangular block on top and a red arch block above that
2. Middle section: A blue cube with an orange triangular roof, next to yellow cylindrical blocks
3. Right section: Yellow cube blocks and an orange house with triangular roof, with green rectangular blocks as supports

# Required Blocks from the Dictionary

Based on my analysis, here are the blocks needed from the dictionary:

1. Red arch block (index 1) - needed 5 times for the bridge/tunnel structure
2. Blue cube (index 2) - needed 1 time for the house/building in the middle
3. Green cube (index 3) - needed 1 time 
4. Orange cube (index 4) - needed 1 time for house base
5. Green horizontal rectangle (index 5) - needed 1 time
6. Green horizontal rectangle (index 6) - needed 2 times
7. Green vertical rectangle (index 7) - needed 2 times
8. Yellow horizontal rectangle (index 8) - needed 1 time
9. Yellow vertical rectangle (index 9) - needed 2 times
10. Yellow horizontal rectangle (index 10) - needed 1 time
11. Yellow half-cylinder (index 11) - needed 2 times
12. Yellow half-cylinder (smaller) (index 12) - not needed
13. Orange cube (index 13) - not needed (already covered by index 4)
14. Orange triangular roof (index 14) - needed 2 times
15. Orange triangular roof (index 15) - not needed
16. Orange triangular roof (index 16) - not needed

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 1
   Step2: Move block with index 1
   Step3: Move block with index 1
   Step4: Move block with index 1
   Step5: Move block with index 1
   Step6: Move block with index 6
   Step7: Move block with index 5
   Step8: Move block with index 2
   Step9: Move block with index 14
   Step10: Move block with index 4
   Step11: Move block with index 14
   Step12: Move block with index 9
   Step13: Move block with index 9
   Step14: Move block with index 11
   Step15: Move block with index 11
   Step16: Move block with index 7
   Step17: Move block with index 7
   Step18: Move block with index 3
   Step19: Move block with index 8
   Step20: Move block with index 10
}
```
